General.Name: Genomma Lab Internacional S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Genomma Lab Internacional, S.A.B. de C.V., together with its subsidiaries, provides pharmaceutical and personal care products primarily in Latin America. It develops, sells, and markets a range of branded products in the categories of anti-acne products, self-diagnosis, antibacterial, cream to improve the texture of scarred skin, shampoos, dandruff shampoos, soaps, razors, products to prevent hair loss, ointment for muscle pain, anti-fungal treatments for the relief of colitis, products to counter stress levels, anti-wrinkles, antacids, anti-ulcers, anti-flu, protection and sexual improvement, treatments against hemorrhoids, against varicose veins, osteoarthritis, ophthalmic medications, and infant nutrition. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Av. Antonio Dovalí Jaime no.70, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 01210
